categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Tinya was a young female Padawan serving the Jedi Order during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Tinya trained as a Jedi at the Almas Academy, a Jedi academy located on the planet Almas. During her time there, she served as a tour guide in Remembrance Hall, a museum located near the Academy. On one occasion, she was assigned to show the Heroes of Cularin around the Academy. However, while she was showing them a holoplacard of the Battle of Ossus, a bomb was detonated by terrorists, destroying the holoplacard and injuring Tinya.
